addi x1, x1 16    I      
addi x2, x1 4	  I      
add x3, x2, x1	  R
add x2, x2, x1	  R
sw x3, x1(16)	  S	 
beq x3, x2, 0x10  B	 



00000001000000001000000010010011
00000000010000001000000100010011
00000000000100010000000110110011
00000000000100010000000100110011
00000000001100001010100000100011
00000000001000011000100001100011
